text: Ellarum Chollanu () is a 1992 Indian Malayalam-language comedy-drama film directed by Kaladharan and written by Rafi Mecartin, starring Mukesh and Jagathy Sreekumar in the lead roles.http://www.malayalamcinema.com/film_ellarum-chollanu-.htm ==Plot== The story is about Ramachandran (Mukesh), who comes back from Dubai to the village posing as a rich business man with a fortune. Actually, he was a victim of visa fraud and was acting as assistant to lottery ticket seller Adimakkannu (Mamukkoya). Rumours of his fortune were actually spread by his friends. But Ramachandran plays along and tries to take over the major factory in the village, Archana Mills. ==Cast== * Mukesh as Ramachandran Menon * Suman Ranganathan as Archana * Maniyanpilla Raju as Mani * Mamukkoya as Adimakkannu * Saikumar as Dasutty * Paravoor Bharathan as Mathunni * Jagathy Sreekumar as Pillai * Oduvil Unnikrishnan as Ravunni Menon * Vijayaraghavan as Gopalakrishnan/ G. K. * A. C. Zainuddin as Shaik Ahammed khaltha * Sukumari as Ramachandran Menon's mother * Beena Antony * Kollam Thulasi * Abi * Kalabhavan Rahman * Kalabhavan Haneef *Usharani == Soundtrack == Songs were composed by S. P. Venkatesh, with lyrics penned by Sreekumaran Thampi. {| class="wikitable" !Song !Singers |- |1 "Nammude Naadinu Mochanam" |Balagopalan Thampi |- |2 "Paadu Ini Paadu" |K. J. Yesudas |- |3 "Sukham Sukham" |K. J. Yesudas |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films
title: Ellarum Chollanu
